column1: 資料來源： 勞動部職業安全衛生署。

column1: 說　　明： 1.本表資料係依「職業安全衛生法」第三十八條及施行細則第五十一條，由雇主按月填載職業災害內容及統
column7: Note： 1.This table is compiled from the monthly occupational accidents reports and statistics submitted by employers in accordance
with provisions of Article 38 of the Occupational Safety and Health Act" and Article 51 of the "Enforcement Rules of the"

column1: 2.因94年修訂職業災害統計表及修正職業災害填報方法，故與93年以前資料無法比較。
column7: Occupational Safety and Health Act."

column1: 附　　註： (1).陳報事業單位數及僱用勞工數各年資料為年平均值。
column7: 2.The current data can not be compared with the data prior to 2004 because we revised the content of occupational disaster statistics
tables and amended the method of submitting occupational disaster in 2005.

column1: (2).工作者數於103年以前係指事業單位僱用之勞工，自104年起係指事業單位僱用之勞工及受工作場所負責人
指揮或監督從事勞動之人。
column7: Remark： (1).The year data of reporting enterprises and employee are  year figures add up to the average in a fiscal year.

column1: (3).失能傷害頻率(人次/百萬工時，小數點以下三位不計)＝失能傷害次數／總經歷工時＊1,000,000。
column7: (2).The term  workers " referred to in this sheet means laborers prior to 2014
column8: and then it means laborers or other people engaged ˉ"

column7: in work and directed or supervised by the responsible people in workplaces.

column1: (4).失能傷害嚴重率(日/百萬工時，小數點以下不計)＝總損失工作日數／總經歷工時＊1,000,000。

column7: (3).Frequency of disability (excluding after the third decimal point)=Times of disability / Total person-work hours *1,000,000.ˉ
(4).Severity of disability (excluding after the decimal point)=Total workday lost / Total person-work hours *1,000,000.ˉ
(5).Data series in the table exclude the traffic accidents on the commute.ˉ
